Metadata: Pickling with vinegar and spices is an ancient and easy method of preserving seafood. Commercial processors pickle only a few seafood species, but you can pickle almost any seafood at home. Store pickled seafood in the refrigerator at 32-38 deg. F; use within 4-6 weeks for best flavor. A list of ingredients and equipment needed and recipes using fish, shellfish, and shrimp are provided.
